amendatorysection.catchline: School district or township funds; prorate deposits; when.
amendatorysection.para: When more than one bank, capital stock financial institution, or qualifying mutual financial institution has been designated by the governing body of the school district or township as a depository, the treasurer or ex officio treasurer shall not give a preference but shall prorate deposits in the manner required of county treasurers as provided in section 77-2314. This section shall have no application to certificates of deposit. Section 77-2366 shall apply to deposits in capital stock financial institutions. Section 77-2365.01 shall apply to deposits in qualifying mutual financial institutions.
